Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class CommentServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.CommentServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommentServiceInterface
@Service @Transactional public class CommentServiceImpl extends Object implements CommentServiceInterface
Implementation of the CommentServiceInterface that provides services related to handling comments.

This service handles CRUD operations on comments, including adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving comments. It also interacts with the Kafka message broker to send events when comments are created, updated, or deleted.

Additionally, the service utilizes caching mechanisms to optimize the retrieval of comments and comment counts.

Key Features:

  • Creates, updates, and deletes comments, while synchronizing with Kafka for event-driven architecture.
  • Caches comment data to reduce database load.
  • Performs validation of posts and users before adding or updating comments.
  • Deletes all comments related to a specific user or post.
  • Handles comment existence verification.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

      Constructs a new CommentServiceImpl with the specified dependencies.
      Parameters:
      commentRepository - the repository used to interact with the comments database
      validationServiceImpl - the service used for validating posts and users
      kafkaTemplate - the Kafka template used for sending events

  • Method Details

    • getUserIdByCommentId

      @Cacheable(value="comments", key="#commentId") public Long getUserIdByCommentId(Long commentId)
      Retrieves the user ID associated with a specific comment ID.

      This method utilizes caching to improve performance. The result is cached using the comment ID as the key.

      Specified by:
      getUserIdByCommentId in interface CommentServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      commentId - the ID of the comment whose user ID is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the user ID associated with the given comment ID

    • deleteAllByPostId

      @CacheEvict(value="comments", allEntries=true) public void deleteAllByPostId(Long postId) throws CommentNotFoundException
      Deletes all comments associated with a specific post ID.

      This method retrieves all comments for the given post and deletes them one by one, using the deleteComment(Long) method.

      This method evicts the cache to ensure that the comment data is refreshed after the deletion.

      Specified by:
      deleteAllByPostId in interface CommentServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post whose comments are to be deleted
      Throws:
      CommentNotFoundException - if no comments are found for the specified post ID

    • getCountOfCommentsByPostId

      @Cacheable(value="commentsCount", key="#postId") public Long getCountOfCommentsByPostId(Long postId)
      Retrieves the count of comments associated with a specific post ID.

      This method uses caching to store the count of comments for the given post ID.

      Specified by:
      getCountOfCommentsByPostId in interface CommentServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post whose comment count is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the number of comments for the specified post ID

    • deleteAllByUserId

      @CacheEvict(value="comments", allEntries=true) public void deleteAllByUserId(Long userId) throws CommentNotFoundException
      Deletes all comments associated with a specific user ID.

      This method retrieves all comments for the given user and deletes them one by one, using the deleteComment(Long) method.

      This method evicts the cache to ensure that the comment data is refreshed after the deletion.

      Specified by:
      deleteAllByUserId in interface CommentServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose comments are to be deleted
      Throws:

    • commentVerification

      public boolean commentVerification(Long commentId)
      Verifies if a comment with the specified ID exists.

      This method checks the existence of a comment in the database using its ID.

      Specified by:
      commentVerification in interface CommentServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      commentId - the ID of the comment to verify
      Returns:
      true if the comment exists; false otherwise

    • addComment

      @CacheEvict(value="comments", allEntries=true) public void addComment(CommentCreateDto commentCreateDto)
      Adds a new comment to the system.

      This method validates the post and user before creating a new comment. The comment is then saved to the database and an event is sent to Kafka indicating that a comment has been created.

      This method evicts the cache to ensure that the comment data is refreshed.

      Specified by:
      addComment in interface CommentServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      commentCreateDto - the data transfer object containing the information for the new comment

    • updateComment

      @CachePut(value="comments", key="#commentId") public void updateComment(Long commentId, CommentCreateDto commentCreateDto) throws CommentNotFoundException
      Updates an existing comment identified by its ID.

      This method updates the content of the comment and the updated timestamp, saving the changes to the database. An event is then sent to Kafka to indicate that a comment has been updated.

      This method puts the updated comment in the cache to reflect the changes.

      Specified by:
      updateComment in interface CommentServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      commentId - the ID of the comment to be updated
      commentCreateDto - the data transfer object containing the updated comment information
      Throws:
      CommentNotFoundException - if the comment with the specified ID is not found

    • deleteComment

      @CacheEvict(value="comments", key="#commentId") public void deleteComment(Long commentId) throws CommentNotFoundException
      Deletes a comment identified by its ID.

      This method deletes the comment from the database and sends an event to Kafka indicating that the comment has been deleted.

      This method evicts the comment from the cache to ensure the data is updated.

      Specified by:
      deleteComment in interface CommentServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      commentId - the ID of the comment to be deleted
      Throws:
      CommentNotFoundException - if the comment with the specified ID is not found

    • getAllByPostId

      @Cacheable(value="comments", key="#postId") public List<Comment> getAllByPostId(Long postId) throws CommentNotFoundException
      Retrieves all comments associated with a specific post ID.

      This method retrieves the list of comments for the given post ID, or throws an exception if no comments are found.

      The result is cached to optimize subsequent retrievals.

      Specified by:
      getAllByPostId in interface CommentServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post whose comments are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of comments associated with the specified post ID
      Throws:
      CommentNotFoundException - if no comments are found for the specified post ID
